definition[0]: (1974–)  a British pop singer who was called Posh Spice when she was a member of the Spice Girls. She started singing on her own after the group stopped working together. She married the footballer David Beckham and they have three children. The couple are famous celebrities (celebrity) who often appear in newspapers and magazines wearing expensive, fashionable clothes. Newspapers often call them Posh ‘n’ Becks. She is also a fashion designer and has her own range of jeans, sunglasses, and perfumes.
